channel.title: How to make an automatic yell message go off after 5 minutes?
channel.description: How do I make it so every 5 minutes a yell message goes off that says "Please Donate!" to the entire server?

item.source: How to make an automatic yell message go off after 5 minutes?

item.title: How to make an automatic yell message go off after 5 minutes?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Do this tutorial, then in the ‘initialize’ method in the Client class (public void initialize()), add this:

EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("Your Message here."); } }, 300000);

If you’re using a Deltascape based server, replace ‘sendMessage’ with ‘sM’.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an automatic yell message go off after 5 minutes?

item.title: How to make an automatic yell message go off after 5 minutes?
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

Add

public int AncTimer = 200;

Under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Then find

public boolean process()

under that, add

if (AncTimer <= 0) {
sM("[Announcement]TEXT");
sM("[Announcement]MORE");
sM("[Announcement]MORE");
AncTimer = 200;
}

Enjoy.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

	
	if(timerMsg > 0)
	timerMsg -= 1;
	
	if(timerMsg == 0) {
	sM("your message");
	timerMsg = how many seconds you want here;
	}
